KCCAns: Recommended for sprey Agro Servo extract @3ml/Lastraw @5ml per litre of water.
Recommended for sprey Agro Servo extract @3ml/Lastraw @5ml per litre of water.

Recommended for Manuring
Application of organic manures such as neem cake @ 1 kg or poultry manure/farmyard manure/compost/vermicompost @ 2kg per plant may be done once in a year during May-June. Application of Mussorie rock phosphate or bone meal may be done, if found necessary, based on soil analysis.

QueryText:
Asking about Mosaic or Katte disease in cardamom
and blood stains in the teat of milking cow
KCCAns: Recommended for spray of neem oil @ 3ml/lit of water, destroy of affected plants.and contact with the local vetenerary officer
